title: Local authors take part in Hometown Harvest
title_page: Local authors take part in Hometown Harvest
maintext:
The Somonauk Public Library will host a Local Author Fair from 1 to 5 p.m. Saturday, Oct. 20, during Somonauk Hometown Harvest. The fair will be in the meeting room at Village Hall.
Residents can meet 13 local authors and purchase signed copies of their books. The Friends of the Library will provide light refreshments.
Participating authors include Mary Ellen Aschenbrenner, Emily Assell, Joan Aubele, J.L. Callison, Lynn Cornell, Alex Edwards, C L Gibson, Sue Giocolo, Bambi Harris, Mary Lamphere, Lisa Maggiore, Lydia Quattrochi and Rania Zeithar.
